attributes.action: Give all keyworkers a 10% reduction in taxes during Covid 19 pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: To recognise the hard work of the keyworkers especially social care who have had little appreciation throughout the pandemic.
attributes.background: We want Government to give recognise the efforts of all keyworkers and give them a reduction in there taxes to show their appreciation for all there hard work during the pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Give essential and key workers a tax break/refund: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567150

Give all key workers a £10,000 tax break (in addition to the existing allowance): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320647

Suspend PAYE Tax for all frontline Key workers for 6 months: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556818

It's not clear from your petition whether you wanted income tax or all taxes to be reduced for key workers, but if you want the Government to change taxes in a way different to the above you could start a new petition requesting this.
